short_summary: Selection of one (1) Level 2 Business Transformation Architect
description: The government of Canada organizes the competition for informatics professional services, such as business analysis, data engineering, data science, and software development for its software program.",

full_summary:
================

**Government Tender Announcement**
--------------------------------

**Reference Number** : PW-23-01020732
**Solicitation Number** : 10074704
**Publication Date** : January 10, 2023
**Tender Closing Date** : January 27, 2023, at 14:00:00

**Description**
-------------

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites proposers to submit their bid for one (1) Level 2 Business Transformation Architect under the Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) supply arrangement.

**Category**
------------

Informatics Professional Services

**Trade Agreements**
-----------------

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

*   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
*   Ontario-Quebec Trade and Cooperation Agreement
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Quebec-New York Corridor Agreement
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade (GATT)
*   Quebec-New Brunswick Procurement Agreement
*   Atlantic Procurement Agreement
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

**Regions of Opportunity**
-----------------------

*   National Capital Region (NCR)

**Contracting Entity**
-------------------

*   Public Works and Government Services Canada
*   Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada

**Contact Information**
-------------------

*   Arielle Rivet
*   Email: [arielle.rivet@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:arielle.rivet@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
*   Phone: Not available

**Tender Description**
------------------------

The tender is issued to satisfy the requirement for Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) under the TBIPS supply arrangement method.
